    What Features We Provide?

    Why do you need a browser-based webinar platform?

    Online Events

    Host successful virtual conferences with flexible scheduling webinar templates and interactive features.

    Payments with Ease

    Processing payments through Stripe makes it safe and easy to charge for your events in advance.

    Large-scale Video Events

    One virtual meeting room
    can accommodate dozens of speakers and thousands of participants.

    Worry-free Events

    The latest privacy and security features come standard with Engitech.

    Online Courses

    Share your valuable knowledge. Showcase study materials, draw on the whiteboard, and administer quiz-style exams.
